title: 【3-D Mobs Texture Pack】更3D的生物模型材质包【1.14/1.15/1.16】【16x】
author: 爱心魔王FHC
txt_content:
本帖最后由 爱心魔王FHC 于 2021-1-22 13:25 编辑 

更3D的生物模型材质包This pack makes 11 different mobs look more 3-D. It includes creepers, skeletons, husks, and many more! Keep in mind that i will be improving the pack and adding more mobs every once in a while. If you see any thing that looks broken or unfinished comment and I will fix it.这个材质包给11个生物制作了新的3D模型，包括苦力怕、骷髅、尸壳等等。持续关注作者，在不就的将来会添加更多的生物模型进去，如果发现了BUG可以去原帖评论，作者将会修复它们。作者: CheezeeHobo包含的生物


-Skeleton, Wither Skeleton, And Stray- Added 3-D Rib Cage and Skull
-骷髅、凋灵骷髅和流浪者，包括3D的胸腔和头颅



-Creeper- Added 3-D Face
-苦力怕，添加了面部的3D



-Bee- Added 3-D Legs, stinger, and antennae.
-蜜蜂，添加了3D的腿、针、触角

-Husk- Added Brain and Mouth
-尸壳，添加了脑子和嘴巴



-Wolf- When angry mouth opens
-狼，生气的时候嘴巴会张开

-Shulker- Added 3-D shell
-潜影贝，3D的外形

-Chicken- Added 3-D feet
-鸡，3D的脚

-Cow- Added 3-D udders
-牛，3D的乳房

-Snow Golem- Added 3-D buttons and improved face (while sheared)
-雪傀儡，3D的扣子，并且改进面部表情（当没有南瓜头的时候）

+ Also made shield handle 3-D.
也添加了3D的盾柄

材质分辨率16x支持的版本1.14/1.15/1.16下载链接: https://pan.baidu.com/s/1lN2sVkeHjVAhi04--nDSrQ
提取码: 3d3d
